price: Ìyẹn ni ọjọ́ òdodo. Nítorí náà, ẹni tí ó bá fẹ́ kí ó mú ọ̀nà tó máa gbà ṣẹ́rí padà sí ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa rẹ̀ pọ̀n (ní ti ìronúpìwàdà).
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-yawmu al-ḥaqu faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi maāban
